name: SKTileDefinition
desc: A single tile that can be repeated in a tile map.

items.name: init(texture: SKTexture)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile definition with a single texture.

items.name: init(texture: SKTexture, normalTexture: SKTexture, size: CGSize)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile definition with a single texture and separate normal texture for simulating 3D lighting.

items.name: init(texture: SKTexture, size: CGSize)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile definition of a specified size with a single texture.

items.name: init(textures: [SKTexture], normalTextures: [SKTexture], size: CGSize, timePerFrame: CGFloat)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile definition with arrays of textures and normal textures for animation.

items.name: init(textures: [SKTexture], size: CGSize, timePerFrame: CGFloat)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile definition with an array of textures for animation.

items.name: var flipHorizontally: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that flips the definition’s image vertically.

items.name: var flipVertically: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that flips the definition’s image horizontally.

items.name: var rotation: SKTileDefinitionRotation
items.desc: The rotation of the tile definition in 90˚ increments.

items.name: enum SKTileDefinitionRotation
items.desc: The allowed rotations for a given tile.

items.name: var textures: [SKTexture]
items.desc: An array of SKTexture objects that defines the tile definition object's content.

items.name: var normalTextures: [SKTexture]
items.desc: An array of SKTexture objects used to generate the normals for the tile to simulate 3D lighting.

items.name: var timePerFrame: CGFloat
items.desc: The duration, in seconds, that each texture in the textures array is displayed before switching to the next texture in the sequence.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: A name associated with the tile definition.

items.name: var placementWeight: Int
items.desc: The placement weight of the tile definition.

items.name: var size: CGSize
items.desc: The size of the tile definition in points.
